register.description:
General Purpose Input/Output Data Out
This register is used to set data on the pads assigned to AUX

bitfield.description: Software should not rely on the value of a reserved. Writing any other value than the reset value may result in undefined behavior.
Output values for AUXIO0 through AUXIO7 (for AIODIO0) or AUXIO8 through AUXIO15 (for AIODIO1).

register.description:
Input Output Mode
Controls pull-up pull-down and output mode for the IO pins assigned to AUX

bitfield.description: Software should not rely on the value of a reserved. Writing any other value than the reset value may result in undefined behavior.
Selects mode for AUXIO7 (for AIODIO0) or AUXIO15 (for AIODIO1).

bitenum.token: Open-source: The pin is driven high when the corresponding GPIODOUT bit is 1, and otherwise tri-stated or pulled depending on the corresponding IOC configuration.
bitenum.description: Open-source: The pin is driven high when the corresponding GPIODOUT bit is 1, and otherwise tri-stated or pulled depending on the corresponding IOC configuration.

bitenum.token: Open-drain: The pin is driven low when the corresponding GPIODOUT bit is 0, and otherwise tri-stated or pulled depending on the corresponding IOC configuration.
bitenum.description: Open-drain: The pin is driven low when the corresponding GPIODOUT bit is 0, and otherwise tri-stated or pulled depending on the corresponding IOC configuration.

bitenum.token: Digital input with GPIODIE bit 7 = 1 Analog input/output with GPIODIE bit 7 = 0
bitenum.description: Digital input with GPIODIE bit 7 = 1 Analog input/output with GPIODIE bit 7 = 0

register.description: General Purpose Input Output Data In

bitfield.description: Software should not rely on the value of a reserved. Writing any other value than the reset value may result in undefined behavior.
Input values for AUXIO0 through AUXIO7 (for AIODIO0) or AUXIO8 through AUXIO15 (for AIODIO1).

register.description:
General Purpose Input Output Data Out Set
Strobes for setting output data register bits

bitfield.description: Software should not rely on the value of a reserved. Writing any other value than the reset value may result in undefined behavior.

Writing 1(s) to one or more bit positions sets the corresponding bit(s) in GPIODOUT.
Read value is 0x00.

register.description:
General Purpose Input Output Data Out Clear
Strobes for clearing output data register bits

bitfield.description: Software should not rely on the value of a reserved. Writing any other value than the reset value may result in undefined behavior.

Writing 1(s) to one or more bit positions clears the corresponding bit(s) in GPIODOUT.
Read value is 0x00.

register.description:
General Purpose Input Output Data Out Toggle
Strobes for toggling output data register bits

bitfield.description: Software should not rely on the value of a reserved. Writing any other value than the reset value may result in undefined behavior.

Writing 1(s) to one or more bit positions toggles the corresponding bit(s) in GPIODOUT.
Read value is 0x00.

register.description: General Purpose Input Output Input Enable

bitfield.description: Software should not rely on the value of a reserved. Writing any other value than the reset value may result in undefined behavior.

Enables (1) or disables (0) digital input buffers for each AUX I/O pin.
Input buffers must be enabled to allow reading pin values through GPIODIN.
Input buffers must be disabled for analog input or floating pins to avoid current leakage.
